search.allResults: That be all we 'ave, me hearty!
search.noResults: We couldn't find anythin' that matches yer search!
search.allFailed: Failed t' find media, walk the plank and try again!
search.title: Wha' be ye wantin' to watch, me matey?

errors.failedMeta: Ye can't trust the compass, failed to load meta
errors.mediaFailed: We failed t' request the media ye asked fer, check yer internet connection, or Davy Jones's locker awaits ye!
errors.videoFailed: Blimey! We encountered an error while playin' the video ye requested. If this keeps happening please report the issue to the <0>Discord server</0> or on <1>GitHub</1>.

notFound.genericTitle: Ahoy! I see nothin' on the horizon.

media.title: Avast ye! Couldn't find that media
media.description: We couldn't find the media ye requested. Either it's been scuttled or ye tampered with the URL, ye scallywag!

provider.title: Walk the plank! This provider has been disabled
provider.description: We had issues wit' the provider or 'twas too unstable t' use, so we had t' disable it. Try another one, arrr!

page.title: Avast ye! Couldn't find that page.
page.description: Arrr! We searched every inch o' the vessel: from the bilge to the crow's nest, from the keel to the topmast, but avast! We couldn't find the page ye be lookin' fer, me heartie.

videoPlayer.findingBestVideo: Finding the best video fer ye, hoist the colors!
videoPlayer.noVideos: Blistering barnacles, couldn't find any videos fer ye. Ye need a better map!

popouts.sources: Wha' provider do ye want to use?
popouts.seasons: Choose which season you wants to watch!
popouts.captions: Select a subtitle language, me hearty!
popouts.playbackSpeed: Change the speed of Blackbeard's ship!
popouts.noCaptions: No captions, hoist the Jolly Roger!
popouts.noEmbeds: No embeds we be found fer this source

errors.loadingWentWong: Shiver me timbers! Somethin' went wrong loadin' the episodes fer {{seasonTitle}}
errors.embedsError: Blimey! Somethin' went wrong loadin' the embeds fer this thin' that ye like

descriptions.sources: Wha' provider do ye wants to use?
descriptions.seasons: Choose which season ye wants to watch
descriptions.captionPreferences: Make subtitles look how ye wants it

errors.fatalError: Blow me down! The video player encounted a fatal error, please report it to the <0>Discord server</0> or on <1>GitHub</1>.

v3.newDomainText: movie-web will soon be movin' to a new domain: <0>https://movie-web.app</0>. Make sure to update all yer bookmarks as <1>the ole website will stop workin' on {{date}}.</1>
v3.tireless: We've worked tirelessly on this new update, we hope ye will enjoy wha' we've been cookin' up fer the past months.
